Package sportstournament.main

Class Market

java.lang.Object
sportstournament.main.Market
public class Market extends Object
This class implements a Market where Athlete's and Item's can be purchased and sold.
Author:
Isaac Steele and Reuben Schoonbee

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Market(GameEnvironment game)
    Default constructor for Market Adds 3 items to the market Creates a list of random athletes to be available for purchase.

    • Market

      public Market(GameEnvironment game)
      Default constructor for Market Adds 3 items to the market Creates a list of random athletes to be available for purchase.
      Parameters:
      game - The instance of GameEnvironment used to keep track of the game

  • Method Details

    • getMoney

      public int getMoney()
      View the available funds
      Returns:
      The money in the current state of the game.

    • viewAvailableItems

      public ArrayList<Item> viewAvailableItems()
      Returns a list of Items available for purchase.
      Returns:
      A list of Items available for purchase.

    • getFreeAgents

      public ArrayList<Athlete> getFreeAgents()
      Returns a list of available Athletes in the Market.
      Returns:
      A list of available Athletes in the Market.

    • addFreeAgent

      public void addFreeAgent(Athlete athlete)
      Adds a new Athlete to be available for purchase in the Market.
      Parameters:
      athlete - The Athlete to be added.

    • setFreeAgents

      public void setFreeAgents(ArrayList<Athlete> freeAgents)
      Sets the list of available Athletes in the market.
      Parameters:
      freeAgents - a list of Athletes to be made available for purchase.

    • buyReserve

      public String buyReserve(Athlete newAthlete, Club club)
      Adds an Athlete from the Market to the Club's reserves and removes the Athlete from the Market.
      Parameters:
      newAthlete - The Athlete to be bought and added to the reserves
      club - The instance of Club that the Athlete will join
      Returns:
      Returns a String that is either an error message because there's insufficient funds or a confirmation of purchase.

    • buyStarter

      public String buyStarter(Athlete newAthlete, Athlete subAthlete, Club club)
      Buys a new Athlete from the Market, puts them on the reserves and then substitutes the chosen Athlete in the active team with the new Athlete.
      Parameters:
      newAthlete - The Athlete purchased from the Market
      subAthlete - The Athlete to be subbed off the active team and put on the reserves.
      club - The instance of Club that the Athlete will join.
      Returns:
      Returns a String that is either an error message because there's insufficient funds or a confirmation of purchase.

    • buyItem

      public String buyItem(Item item, Club club)
      Buys an Item from the Market.
      Parameters:
      item - The Item to be purchased
      club - The instance of Club that the Item will be added to
      Returns:
      Returns a String that is either an error message because there's insufficient funds or a confirmation of purchase.

    • sellItem

      public void sellItem(Item item, Club club)
      Sells an Item back to the market for half its price.
      Parameters:
      item - The Item to be sold
      club - The instance of Club that the item belongs to.

    • sellReserve

      public void sellReserve(Athlete reserve, Club club)
      Sell a reserve back to the Market for half its price.
      Parameters:
      reserve - The reserve to be sold
      club - The instance of Club the reserve belongs to

    • sellStarter

      public void sellStarter(Athlete starter, Athlete replacement, Club club)
      Sells a starter back to the Market for half its price.
      Parameters:
      starter - The starter to be sold back to the Market
      replacement - The reserve that replaces the starter in the active team.
      club - The instance of Club that the starter and replacement belong to.
